attributes.action: Improve access of patients in North Wales to specialist Health services in North-West England
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Patients in North Wales are being refused access to Specialist Health services in North-West England because some Trusts in Merseyside and other parts of North-West England are requesting the North Wales LHB to confirm that they will pay the fees for the consultation.
